types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# [[adjournment]]
# [[deferment]], [[postponement]]
# [[referral]]
# [[failure]] at an exam with an option to [[resit]] it
types.html:
ajournement m (plural ajournements)

  1. adjournment
  2. deferment, postponement
  3. referral
  4. failure at an exam with an option to resit it
trans: failure at an exam with an option to resit it
